title: 'BrotherLee Love' Offers A Fearless, Fresh Tribute To Trumpeter Lee Morgan
teaser: Terell Stafford and his quintet bring a warm and hefty tone to a tribute album honoring the late Philadelphia horn player Lee Morgan. Kevin Whitehead says the new album is risky â€” but successful.
